net.jordaria

Class KeyBind

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.KeyBind

  • public class KeyBind
extends java.lang.Object
    Key bindings which handle state of pressed and time pressed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyBind

        public KeyBind(java.lang.String description,
       int code)
        Sets up a new keybind for the given key and code. The code value is found in org.lwjgl.input.Keyboard.
        Parameters:
        description - A description of the keybinding
        code - The key code for the key

    • Method Detail

      • onTick

        public static void onTick(int keyValue)
        Increases key binding time for bindings that match the given key.
        Parameters:
        keyValue - The value of the key pressed

      • setKeyBindState

        public static void setKeyBindState(int keyValue,
                   boolean pressed)
        Sets the state of the given key to the given state.
        Parameters:
        keyValue - The value of the key pressed
        pressed - True if the key is pressed, false otherwise

      • unPressAllKeys

        public static void unPressAllKeys()
        Sets all keys pressed states to false.

      • resetKeyBindingHash

        public static void resetKeyBindingHash()
        Clears out the keybind HashMap.

      • isPressed

        public boolean isPressed()
        Returns the pressed state of the key binding.
        Returns:
        True if the key is pressed, false otherwise
